items.label: Live Streaming by API Video
items.docId: User Engagement/9 Live Streaming by api.video/index

Collaboration/1 Collaborative Whiteboard.title: Collaborative Whiteboard
Collaboration/1 Collaborative Whiteboard.description: Connect with other users of the app and collaborate using a Whiteboard.

Collaboration/2 Collaborative Document/i.title: Collaborative Document
Collaboration/2 Collaborative Document/i.description: Learn how to collaborate using a document.

Customer Support/1 Chatwoot/index.title: Chatwoot
Customer Support/1 Chatwoot/index.description: The Chatwoot extension makes customer support seamless for your users. Instead of having two interfaces- one for chat between users and one for chat with your support team, you can use CometChat as a front-end for your customer support use case as well!

Customer Support/2 Intercom/index.title: Intercom
Customer Support/2 Intercom/index.description: The Intercom extension makes customer support seamless for your users. Instead of having two interfaces- one for chat between users and one for chat with your support team, you can use CometChat as a front-end for your customer support use case as well!

index.title: Overview
index.description: We believe that building a great chat product does not consist of just voice, video and text chat. It's much more than that. And Extensions are our answer to this.

Moderation/index.title: Moderation
Moderation/index.description: CometChat Moderation features come in two variants:

Notifications/index.title: Notifications
Notifications/index.description: CometChat Notifications come in two variants:

Security/1 Disappearing messages/index.title: Disappearing Messages
Security/1 Disappearing messages/index.description: The Disappearing Messages extension allows end-users to send messages that disappear after a certain interval of time. This extension works for both private (one-on-one) and group messages.

Security/2 End-to-end Encryption/index.title: End-to-End Encryption
Security/2 End-to-end Encryption/index.description: Ensure only your users can read what is sent and nobody in between.

User Engagement/10 Mentions/index.title: Mentions
User Engagement/10 Mentions/index.description: Mentions are a great way to get someone's attention in a conversation. Mentions start with the @ symbol followed by a  name.

User Engagement/11 Giphy/index.title: Giphy
User Engagement/11 Giphy/index.description: GIFs are a great way to change the tone or convey emotions in your conversations. Here's a guide which helps to implement Gifphy in an easy and quick way. Let's get started!

User Engagement/12 Tenor/index.title: Tenor
User Engagement/12 Tenor/index.description: GIFs are a great way to change the tone or convey emotions in your conversations. Here's a guide which helps to implement Tenor in an easy and quick way. Let's get started!

User Engagement/13 Gfycat/index.title: Gfycat (Deprecated)
User Engagement/13 Gfycat/index.description: Gfycat ceased their operations recently. This extension is no longer available.

User Engagement/14 Reminders/index.title: Reminders
User Engagement/14 Reminders/index.description: Create reminders for messages or anything else.

User Engagement/2 Smart Replies/index.title: Smart Replies
User Engagement/2 Smart Replies/index.description: The Smart Reply extension allows you to show quick reply options to a user so that they can easily respond to a message. We will always suggest 3 options; one positive, one neutral and one negative. We also add a category, in case you want to skip some suggestions.

User Engagement/3 Message Translation/in.title: Message Translation
User Engagement/3 Message Translation/in.description: The Message Translation extension helps you translate messages into multiple languages.

User Engagement/4 Emojis/index.title: Emojis (Deprecated)
User Engagement/4 Emojis/index.description: This extension is outdated as all the major browsers natively support emojis.

User Engagement/5 Polls/index.title: Polls
User Engagement/5 Polls/index.description: Polls let you quickly record the opinions directly in the Conversations and also view the results.

User Engagement/6 Reactions/index.title: Reactions
User Engagement/6 Reactions/index.description: Reactions are the ability to react to an individual message with a specific emotion, quickly showing acknowledgment or expressing how you feel in a lightweight way.

User Engagement/7 Stipop/index.title: Stipop
User Engagement/7 Stipop/index.description: Learn how to integrate stickers by Stipop in your app.

User Engagement/8 Stickers/index.title: Stickers
User Engagement/8 Stickers/index.description: The Stickers Extension is more like an image manager which allows you to quickly add/remove stickers directly from the dashboard.

User Engagement/9 Live Streaming by api..id: User Engagement/9 Live Streaming by api.video/index
User Engagement/9 Live Streaming by api..title: Live Streaming by API Video
User Engagement/9 Live Streaming by api..description: The Live streaming by api.video extension enables you to set up a live stream to broadcast to a large number of users.

User Experience/avatars/index.title: Avatars
User Experience/avatars/index.description: This extension allows the end-users to upload an avatar image for their profile.

User Experience/bitly/index.title: Bitly
User Experience/bitly/index.description: Learn how to minify the long website links in your text messages using Bitly.

User Experience/link-preview/index.title: Link Preview
User Experience/link-preview/index.description: The Link Preview extension will help you show a preview of the web page for every link in your message.

User Experience/message-shortcuts/index.title: Message Shortcuts
User Experience/message-shortcuts/index.description: The Message Shortcuts extension enables your users to send each other predefined messages.

User Experience/rich-media-preview/index.title: Rich Media Preview
User Experience/rich-media-preview/index.description: The Rich Media Preview Extension allows the developer to generate rich preview panels for all the popular sites. This extension fetches the first URL from the message for the generation of a preview.

User Experience/thumbnail-generation/ind.title: Thumbnail Generation
User Experience/thumbnail-generation/ind.description: The Thumbnail Generation extension will help you generate a thumbnail preview of an image or a video message.

User Experience/tiny-url/index.title: TinyURL
User Experience/tiny-url/index.description: Learn how to minify the long website links in your text messages using TinyURL.

User Experience/voice-transcription/inde.title: Voice Transcription
User Experience/voice-transcription/inde.description: Voice transcription extension allows you to convert an audio message into text.
